meaningMnemonic: You don't want to keep all the <radical>alcohol</radical> to yourself (<radical>oneself</radical>), so you <kanji>distribute</kanji> it to all of your friends. Heck, not just your friends, to everyone you can find!
readingMnemonic:
As you <kanji>distribute</kanji> the alcohol you say a <reading>hai</reading>ku (はい):

Here you go my friends
Alcohol for everyone
Never drink alone
